text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in https://connect.ichom.org/patient-centered-outcome-measures/stroke
    CodeDisplay
    1At home, with no community support
    2At home with community support
    3In an assisting living home in the community (senior's home)
    4In a rehabilitation hospital or skilled care facilities (SNIF, IRF, LTACH)
    5In long term care (nursing home, chronic care hospital)
    888Other
    999Unknown

name: MolicAVC_LivingLocationPreStrokeValueSet
title: Patient's Residence Prior to a Stroke ValueSet
description: Represents the patient's most recent place of residence before the occurrence of a stroke based on ICHOM code.

concept.display: At home, with no community support
In an assisting living home in the community (senior's home)
In a rehabilitation hospital or skilled care facilities (SNIF, IRF, LTACH)
In long term care (nursing home, chronic care hospital)
